citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
The facility representative was unable to locate the program of veterinary care or contingency plan. Not being able to
produce a program of veterinary care or contingency plan during inspection doesn't allow for APHIS officials to ensure the
animals are being cared for as per the instructions of the Attending Veterinarian and that an adequate emergency plan is
in place for the facility. The licensee must find and produce the program of veterinary care and contingency plan at the
next inspection. If the program of veterinary care and contingency plan can't be found, then the licensee must have the
Attending Veterinarian fill out a new program of veterinary care and a new contingency plan must also be created. Correct
starting on 12/16/24.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
End of report.
n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
The facility representative was unable to locate the program of veterinary care or contingency plan. Not being able to 
produce a program of veterinary care or contingency plan during inspection doesn't allow for APHIS officials to ensure the 
animals are being cared for as per the instructions of the Attending Veterinarian and that an adequate emergency plan is 
in place for the facility. The licensee must find and produce the program of veterinary care and contingency plan at the 
next inspection. If the program of veterinary care and contingency plan can't be found, then the licensee must have the 
Attending Veterinarian fill out a new program of veterinary care and a new contingency plan must also be created. Correct 
starting on 12/16/24. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
End of report. 
 
 n
